itemFeatures.itemFeature: Compatible with all memory foam, wrapped coil and hybrid mattresses
Note: Purchasing mattress and foundation from two different brands may void warranty; check warranty for details

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Take sleep to a whole new level with the king power base with adjustable head and feet. In a zero gravity position, weightlessness is simulated and pressure points are eliminated. Raise your legs to increase blood circulation and relieve pressure on your lower back. Raise your upper body too. The benefits include: comfort for those who want to sit up in bed and better breathing, essential for those who snore or experience acid reflux. Two convenient USB ports are located at the head of the frame for connecting your electronics. Wall hugging adjustable base stays away from headboards and footboards for smooth, silent motion. Platform and storage bed frames are compatible.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Compatible with all memory foam, wrapped coil and hybrid mattresses
Note: Purchasing mattress and foundation from two different brands may void warranty; check warranty for details

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Take sleep to a whole new level with the king power base with adjustable head and feet. In a zero gravity position, weightlessness is simulated and pressure points are eliminated. Raise your legs to increase blood circulation and relieve pressure on your lower back. Raise your upper body too. The benefits include: comfort for those who want to sit up in bed and better breathing, essential for those who snore or experience acid reflux. Two convenient USB ports are located at the head of the frame for connecting your electronics. Wall hugging adjustable base stays away from headboards and footboards for smooth, silent motion. Platform and storage bed frames are compatible.

item.itemFeatureText: Frame constructions have been rigorously tested to simulate the home and transportation environments for improved durability. Components are secured with combinations of glue, blocks, interlocking panels and staples. Stripes and patterns are match cut. All fabrics are pre-approved for wearability and durability against AHFA standards. Cushions are constructed of low melt fiber wrapped over high quality foam. Features metal drop-in unitized seat box for strength and durability. All metal construction to the floor for strength and durability. The reclining mechanism features infinite positions for comfort. Upholstery features top-grain leather in the seating areas with skillfully matched DuraBlend® upholstery everywhere else.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Leather interior upholstery; vinyl/polyester (leather match) exterior upholstery
High-resiliency foam cushions wrapped in thick poly fiber
Corner-blocked frame with metal reinforced seat

itemFluffs.itemFluff: This is the sophisticated rocker recliner you’ll love. Not only is it stylish, it’s also extremely plush. The entire seating area is wrapped in our highest quality leather for a decadent experience. Kick back, relax and settle in.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Tabletop made of solid acacia wood

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Modern eclectic style. Merging a clean-lined, blocky profile with an earthy aesthetic that incorporates a touch of Asian influence, this richly rugged dining room table is minimalism with maximum substance. Rife with planked detailing and saw marked edges, the tabletop's hand-worked dark walnut finish is a labor of love. Crafted of solid wood with a sturdy canted metal base, its quality construction is sure to serve you beautifully for years to come.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Removable shelf in lower center storage compartment

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Modern eclectic style. Merging a clean-lined, blocky profile with an earthy aesthetic that incorporates a touch of Asian influence, this richly rugged server is minimalism with maximum substance. Rife with planked detailing and saw marked edges, the hand-worked dark walnut finish is a labor of love, while the quality construction is sure to serve you beautifully for years to come.

Table extends by pulling both ends and dropping in leaf

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Stainless steel hardware is durable, corrosion resistant
Cleans easily with soap, water and a soft sponge

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Gather around this rectangular outdoor cocktail table for heartwarming quality time. Durable and long-lasting aluminum frame has the attractive appearance of wood. Slat top adds an element of style. Decorate it with trendsetting outdoor accessories or a serving tray for guests to complete the look.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Stainless steel hardware is durable, corrosion resistant
Cleans easily with soap, water and a soft soft sponge

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Gather around with this square outdoor end table at your side for heartwarming quality time. Durable and long-lasting aluminum frame has the attractive appearance of wood. Slat top adds an element of style. Decorate it with a plant in a trendsetting vase to complete the look.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Made of rust-proof powdercoated aluminum frame
CSA-approved 40,000 BTU stainless steel burner, glass beads, burner cover and all-weather PVC cover
Battery-operated ignition system with adjustable flame control; battery included
Side door conceals gas propane tank (not included)
Assembly of fire pit table provided with in-home delivery; connection to propane tank or connector hose not provided

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Gather around this rectangular fire pit table for heartwarming quality time. Slat top adds an element of style. Remove the burner cover to watch the flame glow beautifully over glass beads. Sliding side door smoothly rolls out for you to place the gas propane tank. With its rust-proof aluminum frame, you’ll be enjoying this durable fire pit table for years to come.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Includes 2 cushioned swivel rocker lounge chairs
Clean fabric with mild soap and water, let air dry; for stubborn stains, use a solution of 1 cup bleach to 1 gallon water
All-weather foam cushion core wrapped in soft polyester

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Just one look at this outdoor swivel lounge chair makes you want to sit down and relax. Ladderback design with plush cushions is casual yet attractive. Lounge about and swivel all around to take in the view. Hesitant about putting light colored upholstery outside? High-performance Nuvella™ fabric makes it easy to clean any dirt or stains.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Clearcoat latex backing; rug pad recommended

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Abstract area rug makes the ultimate statement for an effortlessly chic sense of style. Rich range of colors from aqua and blue, to gold and spice provide endless inspiration.
With its multitude of colors and artisan weave, this striking accent pillow spins a good yarn. Feather fill adds to its decadent softness.
Hand-smocked detailing gives this accent pillow layer upon layer of textured interest. The fact that it’s machine washable makes it beautifully practical, too.
Next time you’re wrapped up in a book or a movie on TV, try wrapping yourself in the sumptuous feel of this throw. Yes, it’s every bit as soft as it looks.
Girly-girly style is unabashedly in full bloom in this accent pillow. Fun pom pom shape and layer upon layer of ruffles are sure to delight.

itemFeatures.itemFeature: Clean with a soft, dry cloth

itemFluffs.itemFluff: These photo frames are a picture-perfect take on contemporary style. Adorned with a naturally pleasing textural pattern, the beautifully beveled metal sports a chrome-tone finish for high-glam sheen and shine.

groupInformation.groupFeatures: The M9X542 and M9X542A must be ordered together. The M9X552 and M9X552A must be ordered together. If being used with either the Queen or King stand alone headboard, the M100-32 headboard bracket must also be purchased. If being used with the California King stand alone headboard, the M100-52 headboard bracket must also be purchased. Parts are available by calling 800-248-5988.

Table, bench and server are made with solid Acacia in dark brown wood tone with various distressing elements. Bench and table have thick framed and planked effect top and rectangular metal base in a canted form is finished in a dark tone. Wood chair has wide horizontal back rails has a dark brown PU seat. Server has metal base, two large frame and panel doors, and three good size drawers.

T077-117,-137 angled base chair side end tables are designed so the base slides under the base of your seating and the table top can get close. T077-117 is made with select veneers and hardwood solids and finished in medium brown. T077-137 is made with select veneers and hardwood solids and finished in white paint.
Wall Art Display Unit. Holds 10 Pairs of Promotional Wall Art (2/CN). Espresso Finished Metal.
B020-181,182 bed is fully upholstered platform look bed with a dark brown faux leather cover.

groupInformation.groupDescription: With the warm two-tone look of the cottage white and burnished brown finishes beautifully accenting the stylish cottage design, the “Whitesburg” dining collection creates an inviting cottage retreat within the décor of any dining room.
groupInformation.groupFeatures: Made with select veneers and hardwood solids in a two-tone finish. Table and server top and chair seat is finished in a burnished brown color. The chair frame, table and server base is finished in cottage white paint. Antique bronze color bin pulls. Glued and screwed corner block construction.

For indoor or outdoor use (excluding fire pit chat set). Cushioned aluminum seating, modular seating and fire pit chat sets. 3 throw pillows included with each LAF and RAF loveseat and curved corner chair. 4 throw pillows included with sofa. 2 throw pillows included with loveseat. Rust free aluminum frames. High performance Nuvella fabric. Some assembly required. Many seating configurations available. Rectangular slat top aluminum fire pit includes: CSA approved 40,000 BTU stainless steel burner, glass beads, burner cover and weather cover. Battery operated igniter (battery included). Can be converted for natural gas use.
